title: Danyasamit
author: Danyasamit
content: Hello colleagues.We are pleased to present you our low-level USDT TRC-20 payment solution https://tokencore.io/We provide an API to automate payments in USDT TRC-20 without AMLWithdrawals for all payments are made once at 00:00 UTCPayout limit 20 USDT (once the amount of receipts is exceeded, everything will be sent).Our commission is 4%For all your questions, you can write in a personal or telegram @zavhost

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: Quote from: Danyasamit on July 29, 2023, 07:22:23 PMHello colleagues.We are pleased to present you our low-level USDT TRC-20 payment solution https://tokencore.io/We provide an API to automate payments in USDT TRC-20 without AMLWithdrawals for all payments are made once at 00:00 UTCPayout limit 20 USDT (once the amount of receipts is exceeded, everything will be sent).Our commission is 4%For all your questions, you can write in a personal or telegram @zavhostif you provide TRC20 payment by API, can it use single link from your website? then how long does it take for a withdrawal to our wallet?

comments.author: Danyasamit
comments.body: Quote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 30, 2023, 05:34:49 PMif you provide TRC20 payment by API, can it use single link from your website? then how long does it take for a withdrawal to our wallet?Â  Hello. Yes, we provide an API and this link is available on the tokencore.io website in the documentation.Withdrawals are made automatically once a day at 00:00 UTC, provided that the amount of credits is more than 20 usdt, if the amount is less, requests will be collected until they reach the required amount for payment.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Your website is not much convincing as it does not look real. No much information about your services on your website. No customer care service, no terms and conditions of service, no FAQ, no licence to operate, no office number, no registration number, no team, nothing informative about your site and this led me to check your profile here and it happens you have been here for a long time which I believe you have ideas how things are done here but what makes me curious is the fact that there is no much activities you have done here only to flash this project of yours here or are you still working on your site of yes, then I will advise you to work on it before any further actions be taken by you because no one would want to deal when there is nothing tangible to show.

comments.author: Danyasamit
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on July 31, 2023, 02:28:45 PMYour website is not much convincing as it does not look real. No much information about your services on your website. No customer care service, no terms and conditions of service, no FAQ, no licence to operate, no office number, no registration number, no team, nothing informative about your site and this led me to check your profile here and it happens you have been here for a long time which I believe you have ideas how things are done here but what makes me curious is the fact that there is no much activities you have done here only to flash this project of yours here or are you still working on your site of yes, then I will advise you to work on it before any further actions be taken by you because no one would want to deal when there is nothing tangible to show.We appreciate your attention. Yes, we have created it recently and we will continue to improve the site, all the information to start working is already in the documentation. The main thing is time, we will try to meet your expectations.
